task.title: Operating the heater shutter - Saloon
task.shortdesc: The heater unit box has a shutter which you can manually operate to circulate hot air in the vehicle.

context.p: The heater unit box is located under the control panel and is hand-operated.
context.note: The blower only circulates interior air. It does not introduce fresh air into the vehicle.
The heater unit box is not always cold when the heater is off because a certain amount of heat is always transfered to it from the engine.

step.cmd: Pull the shutter fully upwards to give maximum flow of hot air for interior heating.
Push the shutter fully downwards to deflect hot air onto the windshield for demisting.
